Introduction

Dann (formerly known as Seungbo) is a South Korean singer-songwriter under GF Entertainment. He is the leader of the boy group KINGDOM and a former member of VARSITY.

He officially made his debut as a member of VARSITY on January 9, 2017 with the single "Round One".

In 2017, VARSITY also auditioned to be on MIXNINE. Dann made it through the auditions and was eliminated in episode 7 after ranking 131st place (among all contestants) / 71st place (among male contestants only).

On September 7, 2018 VARSITY announced they would be splitting the group in two. The Chinese members were going to promote in China under a new name while the Korean members would continue using the name VARSITY. VARSITY officially disbanded on April 23, 2020.

Dann debuted as a member of KINGDOM on February 18, 2021 with their mini album History of Kingdom : PartⅠ. Arthur.

He used to be a translator as he knows Korean, English, French and Mandarin. He lived in Dubai when he was 10 but moved back to Korea in 2016.
